/* GameRecorderCandidateRepository.findAllCandidates */ SELECT GJP.GAME_JOIN_PLAYER_SEQ , GJT.GAME_SEQ , GJT.HOME_AWAY_CODE , GJT.TEAM_SEQ , GJP.USER_SEQ , GJT.TEAM_NAME , GJP.NAME AS USER_NAME , GJP.PLAYER_TYPE_CODE , GJP.POSITION_CODE , GJP.EMAIL , GJP.BACK_NUMBER FROM GAME_JOIN_TEAM GJT /* 경기참가팀 */ INNER JOIN GAME_JOIN_PLAYER GJP /* 경기참가선수 */ ON GJT.GAME_SEQ = GJP.GAME_SEQ AND GJT.HOME_AWAY_CODE = GJP.HOME_AWAY_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND GJT.GAME_SEQ = #{gameSeq} AND GJP.PLAYER_TYPE_CODE != '03' /* 선수유형코드 : 비회원 게스트(03)는 제외 */
AND GJT.HOME_AWAY_CODE = #{homeAwayCode}
